REFERRED TO TOURISM, PARKS, ARTS AND SPORTS DEVELOPMENT

Title: Relates to the free use of campsites
Summary: Authorizes the free use of campsites to any person who is semi-ambulatory.
LawSection: Parks, Recreation and Historic Preservation Law
LawCode: Amd ยง13.19, Pks & Rec L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the parks, recreation and historic preservation law, in relation to the free use of campsites
